akn:section.akn:heading: Complaints of retaliation by victims of sexual assault or sexual harassment and related persons: tra

akn:content.akn:p: (a) The Secretary of Defense shall designate a component of the Office of the Secretary of Defense to be responsible for documenting and tracking all covered allegations of retaliation and shall ensure that the Secretaries concerned and the Inspector General of the Department of Defense provide to such component the information required to be documented and tracked as described in subsection (b).
